name: Zombie War - Dead Walking
description:
The Zombies are coming! Gather your guns together to take them on. Don't let them take over the world and humanity die out! Destroy them all and find a cure. Beat the objectives in the game and you just might be able to save the human race. This is a beautifully unique 3-D Zombie slayer game.

Features:
• Realistic graphics
• Many levels
• Kill Zombies!
• No annoying ads
• Many guns to obtain
• The Zombies look and FEEL REAL
• Easy to jump in and play!
